verses.verse: The Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is on me; <S%H3068><s%> because Yahweh has anointed <S%H4886><s%> me to preach good news <S%H1319><s%> to the humble. <S%H6035><s%> He has sent <S%H7971><s%> me to bind up <S%H2280><s%> the brokenhearted, <S%H7665><s%> to proclaim <S%H7121><s%> liberty <S%H1865><s%> to the captives, <S%H7617><s%> and release <S%H6495><s%> to those who are bound; <S%H631><s%>

to proclaim <S%H7121><s%> the year <S%H8141><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s favor, <S%H7522><s%> and the day <S%H3117><s%> of vengeance <S%H5359><s%> of our God; <S%H430><s%> to comfort <S%H5162><s%> all who mourn; <S%H57><s%>

to appoint <S%H7760><s%> to those who mourn <S%H57><s%> in Zion, <S%H6726><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> to them a garland <S%H6287><s%> for ashes, <S%H665><s%> the oil <S%H8081><s%> of joy <S%H8342><s%> for mourning, <S%H60><s%> the garment <S%H4594><s%> of praise <S%H8416><s%> for the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of heaviness; <S%H3544><s%> that they may be called <S%H7121><s%> trees <S%H352><s%> of righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> the planting <S%H4302><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> that he may be glorified. <S%H6286><s%>

They shall build <S%H1129><s%> the old <S%H5769><s%> wastes, <S%H2723><s%> they shall raise up <S%H6965><s%> the former <S%H7223><s%> desolations, <S%H8074><s%> and they shall repair <S%H2318><s%> the waste <S%H2721><s%> cities, <S%H5892><s%> the desolations <S%H8074><s%> of many <S%H1755><s%> generations. <S%H1755><s%>

Strangers <S%H2114><s%> shall stand <S%H5975><s%> and feed <S%H7462><s%> your flocks, <S%H6629><s%> and foreigners <S%H5236><s%> <S%H1121><s%> shall be your plowmen <S%H406><s%> and your vinedressers. <S%H3755><s%>

But you shall be named <S%H7121><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> of Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> men will call <S%H559><s%> you the ministers <S%H8334><s%> of our God: <S%H430><s%> you will eat <S%H398><s%> the wealth <S%H2428><s%> of the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and you will boast <S%H3235><s%> in their glory. <S%H3519><s%>

Instead of your shame <S%H1322><s%> you shall have double; <S%H4932><s%> and instead of dishonor <S%H3639><s%> they shall rejoice <S%H7442><s%> in their portion: <S%H2506><s%> therefore in their land <S%H776><s%> they shall possess <S%H3423><s%> double; <S%H4932><s%> everlasting <S%H5769><s%> joy shall be to them. <S%H8057><s%>

"For I, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, love <S%H157><s%> justice, <S%H4941><s%> I hate <S%H8130><s%> robbery <S%H1498><s%> with iniquity; <S%H5930><s%> and I will give <S%H5414><s%> them their recompense <S%H6468><s%> in truth, <S%H571><s%> and I will make <S%H3772><s%> an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> covenant with them. <S%H1285><s%>

Their seed <S%H2233><s%> shall be known <S%H3045><s%> among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and their offspring <S%H6631><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the peoples; <S%H5971><s%> all who see <S%H7200><s%> them shall acknowledge <S%H5234><s%> them, <S%H2233><s%> that they are the seed which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has blessed. <S%H1288><s%>"

I will greatly <S%H7797><s%> rejoice <S%H7797><s%> in Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be joyful <S%H1523><s%> in my God; <S%H430><s%> for he has clothed <S%H3847><s%> me with the garments <S%H899><s%> of salvation, <S%H3468><s%> he has covered <S%H3271><s%> me with the robe <S%H4598><s%> of righteousness, <S%H6666><s%> as a bridegroom <S%H2860><s%> decks <S%H3547><s%> himself with a garland, <S%H6287><s%> and as a bride <S%H3618><s%> adorns <S%H5710><s%> herself with her jewels. <S%H3627><s%>

For as the earth <S%H776><s%> brings forth <S%H3318><s%> its bud, <S%H6780><s%> and as the garden <S%H1593><s%> causes the things that are sown <S%H2221><s%> in it to spring forth; <S%H6779><s%> so the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh <S%H3069><s%> will cause righteousness <S%H6666><s%> and praise <S%H8416><s%> to spring forth <S%H6779><s%> before all the nations. <S%H1471><s%>
